title: Miffy at the hospital
brief_description: Based on the delightful children’s books by Dick Bruna about Miffy, the white rabbit, this tape includes 8 adventures with Miffy including: The Orchestra- Miffy at the hospital- Poppy’s birthday- The School- The Little Bird- Cinderella- Red Riding Hood and The Apple. Suitable for young children.
